messages.content: A "Bood Boy" is a person who is given a special honor or privilege. It can be used to refer to anyone who has been given a special task or assignment. For example, a Bood Boy might be a person who is sent to deliver an important message or who is given a special mission to complete.

A "good boy" is generally used to refer to a well-behaved boy, or a boy who is doing something nice or helpful. It can also be used to refer to a boy who is demonstrating good manners or is being kind to others.
can we say that for a dog ?
Yes, you can say that for a dog.
